DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety 15-day ceftriaxone versus 15-day doxycycline treatment patient multiple erythema migrans .
DOC.criteria: multiple erythema migrans patient > 15 year history Lyme borreliosis past pregnancy lactation immunocompromised status serious adverse event doxycycline beta lactam antibiotic take antibiotic antiborrelial activity within 10 day
